name: tastily
content:
tastily adverb
(TASTE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that has a pleasant flavour: This rich beef stew is tastily served with mustard-flavoured mashed potatoes. The ribs were slow-cooked and tastily drizzled in barbecue sauce.
More examplesFewer examplesThe dessert is small, but tastily paired with an unusual honey ice-cream.
